description: {"blocks":[{"key":"1u18t","text":"RNA extraction from fungal tissue using the Sigma GeneElute total RNA kit. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9jp57","text":"Flash Freeze tissue in Liquid Nitrogen (LN2).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7g6k0","text":"Grind Fungal Tissue to a fine powder with a mortar and pestle with LN2, be careful to not allow the tissue to thaw during this Process. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"btuif","text":"At this point frozen ground tissue can be stored at -80C for later extraction.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6jku8","text":"add 600ul of buffer RL to a 1.7ml eppendorf tube. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d9of3","text":"Place no more than 50mg of ground tissue into the sample tube with buffer RL.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":6,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7gakg","text":"Incubate for 15-30 minutes at room temperature  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":46,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9e7hl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"7B994BC07D3711ECB744DF6524E9EE71","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a47lh","text":"Centrifuge at maximum speed for 2 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bf7s7","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"aa71b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"equipment","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"id":209,"brand":"Eppendorf","can_edit":0,"guid":"A93BBAE07D3711ECB744DF6524E9EE71","link":"https://online-shop.eppendorf.us/US-en/Centrifugation-44533/Centrifuges-44534/Centrifuge-5425-PF-243560.html","name":"Centrifuge","sku":"5405000441","specifications":"Any benchtop centrifuge will suffice","type":"Benchtop Centrifuge","vendor":{"id":0,"name":"","link":"","is_requested":false,"image":{"source":"","placeholder":""}},"file":null,"image":null}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"c4rju","text":"Transfer the lysate to a new RNAse free  1.7ml tube. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d3ufu","text":"Add 1:1 volume (so 600ul) of freshly prepared 70% etoh","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":29,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5g6sr","text":"Vortex for 10 seconds, or until homogenous ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2v638","text":"Assemble a column with a waste tube from the GeneElute kit. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"908i8","text":"ALL WORK MUST BE DONE IN THE STERILE HOOD THAT HAS BEEN CLEANED FOR RNA WORK","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fcvk0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"51j2u","text":"REGULARLY CHNAGE GLOVES AND  WASH HANDS WITH RNASE TO AVOID DEGREDATION","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2oa3l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1asdh","text":"MAKE SURE ALL PIPETORS, TIPS, AND ANY OTHER EQUIPMENT ARE IN THE HOOD AND CLEANED WITH RNASE","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9f7me","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9b6o9","text":"DO NOT MOVE ANYTHING IN OR OUT WITHOUT WASHING WITH RNASE","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e5s45","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eqmk0","text":"Reagents that need to be made:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1mbvg","text":"Fresh, day of 70% etoh","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"18hhc","text":"Add 600ul of lysate/etoh solution to the assembled column","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9qbcm","text":"Centrifuge at 6000G for 2 minuts","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d7ljb","text":"If lysate is not completely passes, spin at an additional 14,000G for 1 minute","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eldii","text":"Discard waste from waste tube, and repeat step 13 and 14 if more  lysate/etoh exists. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"d39l1","text":"Place column into a new waste collection tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"efv6f","text":"Add 400ul of wash solution A to column","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bq4hc","text":"Centrifuges at max speed for 1.5 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"es29q","text":"discard waste from collection tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7nr6b","text":"Repeat steps 17-19 two more times (for a total of 3x wash steps)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3sir7","text":"Centrifuge Sample for a final 2 minute dry spin at max speed","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cl1ap","text":"Place column in a clean eppendorf tube provided in the GeneElute kit. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"aduqf","text":"add 50ul of elution solution A","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7fn7c","text":"Centrifuge at 200G for 2 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bqj0n","text":"centrifuge at 14,000G for 1 minute","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"mkq","text":"If the entire 50ul has not eluted, then spin for an additional minute at 14,000G","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fifu1","text":"Keep eluted samples on Ice, Prepare a bleach gel for RNA analysis","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3jl5e","text":"BLEACH GEL:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"nppp","text":"100ml TAE","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"amnrb","text":"400ul concentrated bleach","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ef83q","text":"1g agarose","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d8hh3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"jbfm","text":"Make sure to add bleach before microwaving. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":24,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ct4q","text":"Load and run samples normally at 120V for ~20 minutes with a 100bp ladder. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"dp8ft","text":"immediately store samples at -80C after loading gel. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Sigma GeneElute total RNA extraction from fungal tissue
